subject: Baseball
Accidents and Safety
Stadiums and Arenas
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: There is much to disagree with on baseball’s new netting policy. Something as serious as protecting fans from a life-altering injury should not be left to the teams.
snippet: There is much to disagree with on baseball’s new netting policy. Something as serious as protecting fans from a life-altering injury should not be left to the teams.
